info.title: Re-sync Connection Data (Historical Sync)
info.description: Triggers a full historical sync of a connection or multiple schema tables within a connection. If the connection is paused, the table sync will be scheduled to be performed when the connection is re-enabled. If there is a data sync already in progress, we will try to complete it. If it fails, the request will be declined and the HTTP 409 Conflict error will be returned.

operation.description: Triggers a full historical sync of a connection or multiple schema tables within a connection. If the connection is paused, the table sync will be scheduled to be performed when the connection is re-enabled. If there is a data sync already in progress, we will try to complete it. If it fails, the request will be declined and the HTTP 409 Conflict error will be returned.

parameters.name: connectionId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the connection within the Fivetran system.

scope.description:
A map containing an array of tables to re-sync for each schema.

It is an optional parameter that must be non-empty if provided. If not provided, all schemas and tables of the connection are re-synced.
